name: Eye On The World
description:
【Voxelart ✕ Diorama ✕ Exploration Game】


Congratulations, you have been appointed as the town's special probation officer!
The story takes place in a town where surveillance cameras have been installed all over the place to maintain security. Suddenly, you are assigned the task of observing the town, and you will use the images from the surveillance cameras to protect the town's safety by searching for lost children, finding lost items, and searching for cats that live in the town.
You will be able to complete your missions smoothly, but you will gradually begin to feel a sense of discomfort with the town and the world,
But you will start to feel something strange about the town and the world, and when you have completed all the missions, you will discover the mystery of this world.

Eye On The World" is an exploration adventure game in which you will find various objects in an exciting world made of voxels.
The game is different from picture books and game books that focus on exploration, as the depth and three-dimensionality of the digital 3D world stimulates surprise, inspiration, and creativity.
Let's challenge everyone to a world of fun exploration!
